page.title: 17PRIMARY SCHOOLS SPORTS DAY
page.content: ON TUESDAY{9TH JULY 1985}SHELDON SCHOOL INVITED ALL FEEDER PRIMARY SCHOOLS TO A SPORTS COMPETITION .THERE WERE{7 EVENTS}, HIGH JUMP, LONG JUMP,BALL THROWING, 100 M RUNNING ,200 M RUNNING, 800 M RUNNING AND RELAY . THERE WERE{7 SCHOOLS}TAKING PART, IVY LANE, ST PETER'S, WESTMEAD, KINGTON ST MICHEAL, FROGWELL, MONKTON PARK AND ST PAULS . THE AGE GROUP WAS FROM ABOUT{9 _ 11 YRS OLD . OUR{IMPRESSIONS OF THE DAY}WERE, IT WAS VERY WELL ORGANISED, THEY GAVE YOU {MEDALS}WHICH WERE VERY NICE .IN THE FIELD EVENTS A BOY FROM OUR SCHOOL WAS DOING THE HIGH JUMP YOU HAD TO DO A {SCISSORS JUMP}TO GET OVER THE POLE. HE CAME{JOINT SECOND AND GOT A SILVER {MEDAL.}IN THE{GIRLS RELAY}WE HAD TO RUN FAST TO GET TO THE NEXT GIRL WHO CARRIED ON RUNNING WE CAME{FOURTH}BUT EVEN THAT WAS A STRUGGLE.{
